<<<<<<< HEAD
By the Queene. Where the Queenes Maiestie hath of late tyme had of her louyng subiectes, certayne summes of money by way of loane ... Proclamations. 1571-11-24 England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
1 sheet ([1] p.)
In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie, Imprinted at London : [1571]
A proclamation concerning repayment of loans to the Queen. Publication date from STC. At bottom of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.)
In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie, Imprinted at London : [1571]
A proclamation concerning repayment of loans to the Queen. Publication date from STC. At bottom of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
